about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello! I'm Stephani, a creative developer passionate about crafting beautiful digital experiences. I combine technical expertise with an eye for design to create websites that not only function flawlessly but also look stunning.

whoIAm.title: Who I Am
whoIAm.content: I'm a passionate web developer and designer with a keen eye for aesthetics and functionality. I love creating beautiful, user-friendly experiences that leave a lasting impression.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
whatIDo.content: I specialize in building modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies. My focus is on creating responsive, accessible, and performant websites that look great on any device.

myApproach.title: My Approach
myApproach.content: I believe in a holistic approach to web development, where design and functionality work hand in hand. I strive for clean code, intuitive interfaces, and delightful user experiences.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Connect
contact.description: Feel free to reach out if you're looking for a developer, have a question, or just want to connect.
